%I A012885
%S A012885 7,37,137,9137,29137,629137,7629137,67629137,567629137,6567629137,
%T A012885 16567629137,216567629137,6216567629137,46216567629137,
%U A012885 646216567629137,2646216567629137,12646216567629137,312646216567629137,6312646216567629137,86312646216567629137
%N A012885 Suffixes of 357686312646216567629137 (all primes).
%C A012885 From _Mikk Heidemaa_, Mar 23 2015: (Start)
%C A012885 a(2),...,a(24) all have a single representation (in positive integers) as the sum of two squares (e.g., a(24) = 416865370156^2 + 428846797599^2) and as the hypotenuse of a primitive Pythagorean triple (357686312646216567629137^2 = 10132838975618776700465^2 + 357542758042644694110888^2).
%C A012885 ---
%C A012885 a^2 + b^2 + c^2 + d^2 + e^2 + f^2 = 357686312646216567629137^2;
%C A012885 a=304233682432674451033719; b=185074861663432734470527;
%C A012885 c=4189176178164916432878; d=33333333333333333333333; e=3333333; f=3.
%C A012885 ---
%C A012885 a^2 + b^2 + c^2 + d^2 + e^2 + f^2 = 357686312646216567629137^3;
%C A012885 a=210197737649788368191109924028342434;
%C A012885 b=39738123500625252940689952285037741;
%C A012885 c=777777777777777777777777;
%C A012885 d=777777777777777777777777;
%C A012885 e=777777777777777777;
%C A012885 f=777777777777.
%C A012885 a=170350493188466620042802284807886346;
%C A012885 b=129394423538599186274382140531063939;
%C A012885 c=777777777777777777777777;
%C A012885 d=777777777777777777777777;
%C A012885 e=777777777777777777;
%C A012885 f=777777777777.
%C A012885 ---

%C A012885 y=157555096461604743754426503960480452;
